title: SMNTY Book Club: A Tale of Two Short Stories
itunes:title: SMNTY Book Club: A Tale of Two Short Stories
description:
Get your Swoodies and religious trauma here! In this special Book Club episode, we discuss two short stories: Lose Now, Pay Later, and The Problem of Susan, while digging into issues around weight, fad diets, and women and religion. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
